extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the completely NEW âCadreBible â Bible Study Appâ for Android!* Enjoy Reading or Studying the Scriptures with this innovative, OFF-LINE Bible Study App!* Quick and easy to use for Daily Bible Reading or Study further with our great range of Strongâs, Greek, Hebrew and Latin resources (NO Internet Connection to read).* Large Library of free and premium Bibles, Dictionaries, Commentaries, Cross-References, Reading Plans, Devotionals, Children's Bible Stories and other resources available within ONE app.* Split Screen (2nd Window). Re-sizable Split Window with access to any book in Library.* Workspace (3rd Window). Optimized for Tablets  with on-screen access to Notes, Passage Selector, Search and more.* Parallel. Compare multiple Bibles and Commentaries verse-by-verse.*  Reading Plans: âCreate My Ownâ Reading Plan using any Bible or Commentary. Built-in plans available for download.* Search. Fast Search across multiple Bibles/ books/Notes with advanced Search options.* Look Up.  Look Up a word definition in any installed Dictionary directly through the Bible text.* Passage Selector. Quick Bible Passage Selector with options for List/Grid, Large Buttons, Alphabetical/Canonical listings .* Bookmarks. Bookmark single/multiple verses with âQuick Bookmarkâ option available. Arrange into Categories/Folders or Tag, fully editable.* Notes. Create Notes on single/multiple verses. Arrange into Categories/Folders or Tag, fully editable. Add or Delete verses in existing Notes at any time. Draft Notes.* Highlights. Highlight words, phrases or verses with full color palette.* Underlines. Underline words, phrases or verses with full color palette .* Share. Share your favorite verses via Facebook, Twitter, Text Message, E-mail and other.* Copy. Copy single/multiple verses to clipboard for later use.* History. Stores browsing History for future navigation and reference.* Syncronization & Backup. Built to work with Google Drive enabling access across multiple devices.* Settings. Many custom Settings including:Create your own Themes, Colors for Toolbar, Text, Background & Words of Christ, Font face, Main/Split Window Sync, Auto-rotate Screen, Keep Screen on, Full Screen, Show/Hide Strongâs and more.FREE books (more added periodically):KJVNETISVASVBBEDarbyDouay-RheimsJFB - Commentary Critical and Explanatory on Whole BibleKJ2000KJV ApocryphaLXX â SeptuagintMHCC- Matthew Henry's Concise CommentaryPNTSBL Greek New TestamentScrivener Greek New TestamentTanakhVulgate â Biblia Sacra Juxta Vulgatam ClementineWHGNT - Westcott-Hort Greek New TestamentWEBWeymouthWycliffeYLTPREMIUM books: (Available through In-App purchasing or cadrebible.com)AMP â Amplified BibleBDB - Brown-Driver-Briggs Hebrew DefinitionsBHS â Biblia Hebraica StuttgartensiaESV â English Standard VersionESVSB - ESV Study BibleHCSB â Holman Christian Standard BibleHCSB Strongâs â Holman Christian Standard Bible with Strongâs ConcordanceISV â International Standard Version (with Notes & Maps)IVP â IVP Bible Background Commentary (OT & NT)JGE â John Gillâs Exposition of the Entire BibleKJV Strongâs â King James Version with Strongâs ConcordanceMHC - Matthew Henry's Commentary UnabridgedMSG â The MessageNA27 â Nestle-Aland, Novum Testamentum Graece, 27th Revised EditionNABRE â New American Bible, Revised EditionNASB â New American Standard BibleNASBEC â New American Standard Bible with Exhaustive Concordance (Strongâs)NIV â New International VersionNKJV â New King James VersionNLT â New Living TranslationNRSV-CE â New Revised Standard Version (Catholic Ed)NET Bible (with Notes)SRN - Scofield Reference NotesTGD - Thayer's Greek DefinitionsTSK â Treasury of Scripture KnowledgeWET â The New Testament: An Expanded Translation (Wuest)WSGNT â Word Studies in the Greek New Testament (Wuest)

reviews.title: Buggy version 5
reviews.comment: Fixed some bugs yet introduced another...when the passage is being scrolled, the verse indicator didn\'t show which verse we are on..
reviews.author: Danny Lim

reviews.title: There is potential, but...
reviews.comment: Still some bugs. On HTC Rezound, one cannot scroll past the chapter he is in. Once I reach the end of the chapter, I am stuck. I have to go into the verse picker and choose the next chapter manually.
reviews.author: Matthew Potts

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I have been blessed through this app. Great for studying the word. I enjoy the features.
reviews.author: Jeff johnston

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Just excellent. Cadre was already the best, and now it\'s even better. Thanks for the improved font rendering and smooth scrolling. The new split screen features are great as well.
reviews.author: Joshua Konopka

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Forces close too often but love the variety of Books and offline access. I am looking forward to Cadre v5. Also force close issue is not a good enough reason to uninstall the app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This was a great Bible program, this new update doesn\'t download, it\'s been 5 days of \"transferring data\" and it still hasn\'t finished downloading 2 books.  When Amazon can do it in 45 seconds to 2 minutes, why does this program take days?  Also, there is no exit button, I have to hit the back arrow 3 or 4 times to get out of the program.  This is also very unstable and crashes muliple imes per use ... and that\'s with a tablet that is only 7 months old!  Essentially, they\'re making the user a beta tester.
reviews.author: Mike Smith

reviews.title: Non-intuitive
reviews.comment: How do you bookmark a verse now? Was a simpler app before,  and that was why I liked it. No exit button? I will have yo look for a new Bible app - thos one got too complicated for me.
reviews.author: Mark Kanzler

reviews.title: All the features I wanted
reviews.comment: Has all the features I wanted. The updated UI is pretty but it\'s very buggy now, and slow, and a little hard to use, but has the greatest potential so four stars. I hope function gets better over time so I can love it as much as I did before the updated UI.
reviews.author: Neil McEachin

reviews.title: Hating it more each day
reviews.comment: I really had high hopes for this new version but it is a complete mess. It is not just bugs either, the design of the UI is non-intuitive and clumsy.  1. Selection of text is a mess. The two markers float all over the place and never selects what is intended 2. Selecting by verse is easier but it takes 3 click just to highlight it? Please download any competitors product and try them. See how it should be done.  3. Spaces between words! Why aren\'t they underlined or highlighted??  Sorry but I\'m uninstalling
reviews.author: Stephen Chan

reviews.title: Still broken...
reviews.comment: User interface was never this app\'s strong point, but it was nevertheless a usable and excellent piece of software.  Now the latest update has destroyed even that.  On my tablet, more than half the screen is taken up with the pane used for selecting a verse/book, and absolutely nothing in the settings menus will get rid of it (Trust me, I\'ve tried them all!)  This is a huge shame, because CadreBible was pretty much the only thing I used my Tablet for.  And even on my phone, the app has become useless - Use
reviews.author: John Scott

reviews.title: Progress made
reviews.comment: Progress has been made, but the verse selector does not work. Also, the navigation fix does not work on my Evo. When I drag my finger from the right to the left it goes to the previous chapter rather than the next one while the other way doesn\'t do anything.
reviews.author: Birger Draget

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: I like the potential of the new updated CadreBible but there are too many bugs to give it a higher rating. It crashes often; I can\'t use highlights consistently and the whole program freezes when I try. The program takes several seconds to start, move from one screen to another or use  any of the books or commentaries. Sometimes I can\'t get back to my reading screen after checking out a cross - reference. I also have trouble trying to get out of CadreBible. Where is the exit?
reviews.author: Cliff Reynolds

reviews.title: Almost there!
reviews.comment: I like the ape. Been using it for 2 years. Liked to have parallel translations up, nkjv, nasv w/strings, Greek, Hebrew & Sept. Need to have fonts by translation not just by window. I have bypassed the problem temporarily by keeping a translation in the bottom window,  but I still need the other if I am going to continue bouncing around the scriptures.
reviews.author: Bud Murton

reviews.title: Buggy.....
reviews.comment: Says one thing, does another.  AND I can\'t login thru the app! I can login on the website...Cannot change p-word weird.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No peer certificate?
reviews.comment: Says I can\'t download purchased books, neither can I log in at the moment. Error is no peer certificate please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest Version - Nexus 10
reviews.comment: Immediate crash when running a search, hold and select underlining and highlight feature not working. Please allow the option to turn off scrolling to the next chapter (main window) or verse (TSK). I do this accidentally all the time and did Not have that problem is the last version. Navigation mode? Only one selection? Not even sure what this does :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible update! Useless!
reviews.comment: The app now won\'t show Greek text properly making it utterly useless to me.
reviews.author: Julia Bridget Hayes

reviews.title: Unfortunately it\'s Unstable
reviews.comment: And slow. There are better apps out there than this one.
reviews.author: Robert Binnie

reviews.title: I like the update
reviews.comment: Once the update starting working its great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just perfect:
reviews.comment: Back to being my #1 Bible app.
reviews.author: Hiram Edwards
